itunes:title: Stealing His Restaurant Concept (Jonah Antonyan)
title: Stealing His Restaurant Concept (Jonah Antonyan)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Nick Antonyan, also known as JONAH on the internet (YouTuber, comedian), discusses opening his first restaurant, blowing up on Tik tok, his magic sauce, and the Yelp incident. It's pretty awesome to see a friend succeed with something he loves, hope you guys dig this one!

Follow Jonah's restaurant on instagram @jonahskabob

Follow us on IG @lightweightspod
